intension: Design a captivating poster for the Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) 2024. The poster should inspire attendees to join us in exploring the latest advancements in this field.  The background should be in tones of blue and white. Make sure to prominently draw the CVPR 2024 and conference date. Encourage viewers to register for the event at register@cvpr2024.com.
globalcaption: The image features a blue and white poster advertising the Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition. The poster is divided into two sections, with the top half displaying a blue background and the bottom half showcasing a white background. The conference name and date are prominently displayed in the center of the poster, with the date being May 11, 2024. The poster also includes a call to action, inviting people to join the conference.
keywords: blue, frame, geometric, graphic, pattern, geometric, squares, white, post, instagram, ig, insta, conference, education, science

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a blue square in the center. The blue square is filled with a pattern of smaller blue squares, creating a visually appealing design. The pattern of the blue squares is quite intricate, with some squares overlapping and others arranged in a more linear fashion. The overall composition of the image is simple yet captivating, with the blue square as the focal point

body.text: 9th Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition
